name: "Half Shell Heroes: Blast to the Past" Part 2 Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which topping was NOT on the pizza Mikey made?
questions.explanation:
Bacon.

	That's right, Mikey made a pepperoni, maple syrup and peppermint pizza. It was gone in a flash too. Pretty much the only topping Mikey won't eat on a pizza is anchovies.

questions.text: Did April go back in time with the turtles?
questions.explanation:
No.

	April was absent from the episode. Normally she is included in most of the turtles' adventures. She wasn't even mentioned in the episode.

questions.text: Which of the following happened to the Triceraton soldiers?
questions.correct: It was revealed they wore "special" underwear.
options: It was revealed they were actually humans in disguise.
They tried to shoot their guns only to find them replaced with water pistols.
They were sprayed with retromutagen and became regular dinosaurs.
questions.explanation:
It was revealed they wore "special" underwear.

	Having a bit of fun, the turtles pull down the pants of some Triceraton soldiers and revealed turtle faces on their boxers. Oops, busted. The alien race who had never met the turtles were big fans!

questions.text: Which turtle befriend the T-Rex and rode him into battle?
questions.explanation:
Donnie.

	Nearing time to charge into battle, only Donnie hadn't befriended a dinosaur to fight beside. In came the T-Rex they had escaped from earlier. Donnie managed to help him escape from attack by a larger T-Rex, and they became friends.

questions.text: The turtles returned to their proper time, confident they hadn't changed history, only to see what?
questions.correct: There was a statue of Shredder instead of the Statue of Liberty.
options: The Earth was overrun by dinosaurs in the modern day.
Everything was just as they had left it.
Human society had never evolved, instead the Earth was populated by the Triceratons
questions.explanation:
There was a statue of Shredder instead of the Statue of Liberty.

	Everything appeared to be the same as they had left it, other than the giant statue of Shredder. The episode ended there, not exploring what had happened in the past to change modern society. It set up a potential sequel.

questions.text: Which turtle, master of the katana, wore the blue headband?
questions.explanation:
Leonardo.

	Leonardo is the team leader, and generally considered to be the most mature of the four brothers. He is a natural leader and often plans out both battles and training for his brothers.

questions.text: Which of the turtles first tamed a Triceratop to ride into battle?
questions.explanation:
Leonardo.

	Leo was the first of the turtles to befriend one of the ancient creatures. Eventually all four turtles tamed a beast and they assisted in the assault on the Triceraton base camp.

questions.text: Did Casey Jones go back in time with the turtles?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Neither Casey nor April O'Neil were featured in the episode during the adventure back in time. Both are show regulars in the traditional series, and have toys in the "Half Shell Heroes" toyline.

questions.text: Wearing a purple headband, which turtle spends his time creating science experiments and other inventions?
questions.explanation:
Donatello.

	Donnie is the "nerd" of the group. He often creates machines or other items to assist the turtles in their fight against evil. Debuting in this special was the TurtleBot 5000, a new vehicle with three modes of transportation that Donnie built for himself and his brothers.

questions.text: Which of the four turtles had the biggest appetite for pizza?
questions.explanation:
Michelangelo.

	While all four turtles enjoy scarfing a "pie", Mikey is the one that can never get enough. Despite being millions of years in the past, he found a way to make prehistoric pizza in this special. He'll eat just about any combination of toppings on a pizza, just don't ever give him an anchovy.
